name: Human Planet
description:
A small game made in 5 hours for Trijam #136. Animal cameramen for the station "Human Planet" are chasing you! Hide behind trees and rocks, throw distractions, and escape in a helicopter!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: move
  • D: throw banana (distracts monkey for 5 seconds)
  • S: throw flag (distracts bull for 5 seconds)
  • A: throw fish (distracts lion for 5 seconds)

Hide behind rocks and trees, but you only have 1 of each distraction!
